archimate:Requirement.name: PM.1.3.9b: b) minimising reliance on key individuals (e.g. ensuring supporting documentation is complete and accurate; and arranging alternative cover, job rotation and deputies for key positions)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
